mapper.sql: red_packet_id, user_id, amount, price, give_user_id, create_time, source_order_id, status, obtain_desc, begin_date, end_date, shop_id, business_area_activity_id, client_system_type
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT (s.shop_id) AS shopId, s.shop_name AS shopName, bas.shop_type AS shopType FROM 1dcq_red_packet rp INNER JOIN 1dcq_business_area_shop bas ON bas.business_area_activity_id = rp.business_area_activity_id INNER JOIN 1dcq_shop s ON bas.shop_id = s.shop_id WHERE bas.business_area_activity_id = #{businessAreaActivityId}

SELECT DISTINCT (rp.red_packet_id) AS redPacketId, rp.user_id AS userId, rp.amount AS amount, rp.price AS price, rp. status AS status, rp.begin_date AS beginDate, rp.end_date AS endDate, rp.source_order_id AS sourceOrderId, rp.give_user_id AS giveUserId, rp.create_time AS createTime, s.shop_id AS shopId, s.shop_name AS shopName, bas.shop_type AS shopType, rp.business_area_activity_id AS businessAreaActivityId, ac.activity_rule_name AS activityRuleName FROM 1dcq_red_packet rp INNER JOIN 1dcq_business_area_shop bas ON bas.business_area_activity_id = rp.business_area_activity_id INNER JOIN 1dcq_shop s ON bas.shop_id = s.shop_id INNER JOIN 1dcq_business_area_activity ac ON rp.business_area_activity_id = ac.business_area_activity_id WHERE rp.red_packet_id = #{redPacketId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into 1dcq_red_packet (red_packet_id, user_id, amount, price, give_user_id, create_time, source_order_id, status, obtain_desc, begin_date, end_date, shop_id, business_area_activity_id, client_system_type ) values (#{redPacketId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{giveUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sourceOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{obtainDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessAreaActivityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clientSystemType,jdbcType=TINYINT} )
